remarks: Meet property of a lattice automorphism.  (Contributed by NM, 19-May-2012.)
statement:
lautm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lautm.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lautm.i $e |- I = ( LAut ` K ) $.
lautm $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( F e. I /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( F ` ( X ./\ Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) ./\ ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
